entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General We can see through WH talking pts & your BS response to Trump’s reckless comments.The fact that you’re Not telling people Not to inject disinfectant nor use UV light as Coronavirus treatments are the latest examples of your incompetence. Resign. You’ve lost all credibility. 🤡
